name: Alignment Function
overview:
Computes Alignment of a layout node.
Params:
 - node: https://developers.supernova.io/data-contexts/data-model-objects/layout
 - parent: https://developers.supernova.io/data-contexts/data-model-objects/layout

Returns: dictionary {
  apply: boolean - whether ‘node’ needs alignment
  type?: string - one of Alignment.* constants
}
